replies.body: What if you are not a student any more, although I am not even ranked, but still.....
You can also get involved in community groups like Summoners Society who run tournaments every weekend - https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE

hey mate,

There was an error in the summoner name that was submitted for you. We have worked with your club to get it sorted. You should see the prize in your account now.
Oh cheers, thanks for solving the issue.

Hey Riot! As someone who plays on oceanic servers, can you please do something about the horrendous ping in Guam? We love league, but it hurts a bit when the lag spikes.  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
